author: Reuters Editorial
title: Turkish court accepts indictment against journalist Yucel, decides to release him: Anadolu
text:
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - A Turkish court has accepted an indictment seeking up to 18 years in jail for German-Turkish journalist Deniz Yucel and decided to release him from custody pending trial, state-run Anadolu news agency said on Friday.
Yucel, a reporter for German newspaper Die Welt, was taken into custody a year ago on suspicion of spreading propaganda in support of a terrorist organization. He denied the accusation. The German Foreign Ministry earlier confirmed his release.
Writing by Daren Butler; Editing by David Dolan
